item.title: 15 Gifts To Celebrate Your Favorite Graduates That Aren’t Cash
item.description: If you know someone graduating high school or college and you'd like to gift something personal, try one of these thoughful options.

item.title: ‘Conceiving Crime’ Podcast Tells Horrors Of Abortion, Fertility Industries That Corporate Media Won’t
item.description: 'It's about reclaiming the light and encouraging the listener to take a moment to consider their worldviews,' Parker said.

item.title: Bill Targets Indiana Treasurer Who Stops Banks From Canceling Christians, Gun Owners
item.description: Indiana's treasurer helped push banks to back down on canceling conservatives, and now a banker-backed bill would strip his office's powers.

item.title: ‘Tough Case To Argue’: SCOTUS Poised To Back Parental Opt-Out For LGBT Content In School

item.title: ‘Fact-Checking’ Was Always Just Censorship. Polls Show Americans Could See Through It
item.description: Americans understand the goal of 'fact-checking' — not objective truth, but spreading left-wing propaganda and silencing dissent.
